list.name: Changes
list.comment: Generate the migration file for the Carrier entity and execute it

task.summary: Default task
Create Product controller

Add product detail page functionality
Added route '/produit/{slug}' with name 'app_product' in ProductController Implemented index() method to fetch product by slug from ProductRepository Redirect to home page if product not found Render 'product/index.html.twig' template and pass the product object"

Modify product display layout - Restructured the HTML layout to display the product image and information in a more visually appealing and responsive manner - Added a breadcrumb navigation to show the product category and name - Displayed the product name, price, and description - Added a "Add to cart" button for users to add the product to their shopping cart
Added a link to the product page for each product displayed on the category page
Enhance product image display

Add custom Twig filter to format product prices - Created a new Twig extension that provides a 'formatPrice' filter - The 'formatPrice' filter takes a numeric price value and formats it with thousands separators and the 'DH' currency suffix
Use custom Twig filter to format product prices
Expose all categories as a global Twig variable
Display all categories in the main navigation menu
Cart controller created
add link to cart page

add product to cart
Implemented the `add` action in the CartController to allow users to add a product to their cart.
The action takes the product ID as a parameter, uses the ProductRepository to retrieve the corresponding product, and then adds it to the user's cart using the Cart service.

implement cart management
Added a new `Cart` class to manage the user's shopping cart.
The `Cart` class has the following functionality:
- Constructor that injects the `RequestStack` service to access the user's session. - `addToCart` method that adds a product to the user's cart. It checks if the product is already in the cart, and updates the quantity if so, or adds a new entry with a quantity of 1. - The cart data is stored in the user's session using the `getSession()->set()` method.
Added a new `getCart` method to the `Cart` class to retrieve the user's current cart contents from the session. and pass the cart to the view for debugging
Add the cart layout with css style
Add the flash message

implement cart item quantity increase
Added a new `increase` action in the CartController that allows the user to increase the quantity of a specific product in their cart.
The action is mapped to the `/cart/increase/{id}` route and named `app_cart_increase`.

implement cart item quantity decrease
Added a new `decrease` action in the CartController that allows the user to decrease the quantity of a specific product in their cart.
The action is mapped to the `/cart/decrease/{id}` route and named `app_cart_decrease`.
add the methode decrease
Add route to remove all items from the cart
Implement cart clearing functionality

Add functionality to remove a specific item from the cart
- Implemented `removeFromCart` method to remove an item with a specific ID from the cart stored in the session. - Updates the session with the modified cart after removing the item.

Add route to remove a specific item from the cart
- Added `remove` method to CartController to handle removing an item from the cart based on its ID. - Updates the cart and redirects to the cart page after the item is removed.
add the link to remove a specific item from the cart or clean the cart

Implement method to calculate total price with tax
- Added `getTotalPriceWt` method to calculate the total price of items in the cart, including tax. - Retrieves cart items from the session and sums their prices multiplied by their quantities. - Returns the total price, defaulting to 0 if the cart is empty or not set.

Add method to calculate total quantity of items in the cart
- Implemented `fullQuantity` method to compute the total quantity of items in the cart. - Retrieves cart items from the session and sums their quantities. - Returns the total quantity, defaulting to 0 if the cart is empty or not set. - Added `getTotalPriceWt` method to calculate the total price of items in the cart, including tax. - Retrieves cart items from the session and sums their prices multiplied by their quantities. - Returns the total price, defaulting to 0 if the cart is empty or not set.
Add cart summary section with total quantity and price
Add cart quantity badge to shopping cart link
add link to decrase quantity in cart
entity Address created
Create and execute the migration for the address entiy
Created AddressUserType form using Symfony `make:form` command.
Added route and controller action for managing user addresses in account section.
Added address view to the user account section.
Added address view to the user account section.
Added address form handling with create and update functionality in the user account section.
Added address form handling with create and update functionality in the user account section.
Added address form view to the user account section.
Updated AddressUserType form with input placeholders and custom CSS classes.
Added address listing and management options (edit/delete) in the user account section.
Delete user address: added identity verification and handled deletion with a confirmation message.
create the Carrier entity
Generate the migration file for the Carrier entity and execute it
